events.location: East River, New York City (Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens)
events.description: Iconic Independence Day fireworks show drawing huge crowds every year; a signature summer event for locals and tourists.
Major multi-day music festival featuring top-tier artists across genres; a must-see summer highlight for music fans.

events.location: multiple locations across all five boroughs
events.description: NYC’s signature car-free street event expanded to 400+ blocks citywide for the 400th anniversary; includes fitness, arts, and entertainment.
Vintage-themed outdoor celebration with live jazz, dancing, classic cars, and 1920s-style dress; marked the event’s 20th anniversary.

events.location: USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center, Queens
events.description: The annual Grand Slam tennis tournament, drawing global attention with elite players, ceremonies, and celebrity appearances.
